items.sentence: Tom hasn\'t been able to get in touch with Mary yet.
Tom and I have worked together for over three years.
I have a niece. She goes to the same school as Mary.
Friends are easy to find, but they\'re hard to keep.
I\'m still trying to find out what needs to be done.
Is Tom really going to go to Australia without Mary?
Is it possible to buy something to eat on the train?
I don\'t think Tom knows Mary can understand French.
I don\'t think Tom would mind if I used his bicycle.
He took a look at the newspaper before going to bed.
